onData:function(a,c,f){var d=this;var e="cached-carousel-items";if(f){localStorage.removeItem(e);localStorage.setItem(e,Ext.JSON.encode(a));d.removeAll(true);d.add(a)}else{var b=Ext.JSON.decode(localStorage.getItem(e));if(b&&typeof b=="object"){d.removeAll(true);d.add(b);setTimeout(function(){Controller_Welcome.onlyremote(Ext.bind(d.onData,d))},10000)}else{Ext.Msg.alert("Warning","Cannot find any cached data
for carousel.
Retry to reload in 10 seconds",Ext.emptyFn);setTimeout(function(){Controller_Welcome.onlyremote(Ext.bind(d.onData,d))},200)}}

else{Ext.Msg.alert("Fatal error","Sorry, but cannot load the
Ext.direct API from local storage.");localStorage.removeItem("directApi")}
